title: ClientEarth accuses Commission of disregarding EU law in sustainability overhaul
author: Anna Kerr
text: ClientEarth accuses Commission of disregarding EU law in sustainability overhaul Updated as of: 06 February 2025 The carbon border tax has been added to the EU’s “simplification” drive, as campaigners warn there has been inadequate consultation over sweeping changes.
